product_overview: JyotiAIapp is a cosmic-spiritual platform blending advanced AI and ancient Vedic astrology, providing users with personalized cosmic insights through astrology, numerology, palmistry, aura analysis, and AI-powered guidance within an immersive, spiritual UI experience.
core_goals: Deliver a seamless spiritual experience combining AI and astrology that feels immersive, calm, and guided.
Create an intuitive, beautiful, and emotionally engaging user interface that communicates cosmic and sacred spiritual energies.
Provide comprehensive astrological and psychic services including Kundali, Numerology, Palmistry, Aura and Chakra analysis, Dream Interpretation, Compatibility Matching, and Career Guidance.
Enable intelligent AI support via an AI Guru powered by RAG and LLM technologies.
Ensure high performance and smooth animation with GPU acceleration, while maintaining accessibility and responsiveness for all devices.
Implement a robust payment and subscription system integrated with Razorpay for monetization.
Deliver an extensive admin panel for system management, user control, and monitoring.
key_features: Comprehensive Astrology Suite: Kundali Engine with 3D interactive charts, Numerology with detailed profiles, Palmistry and Face Reading using AI Vision, Aura and Chakra Analysis, and Vastu Shastra guidance.
AI Guru Chat: AI-powered spiritual assistant with contextual RAG-powered insights, personalized responses, and scripture references.
Immersive Cosmic UI: Deep cosmic backgrounds powered by Three.js and React Three Fiber, subtle nebula shaders, particle universes, mandala overlays, and cosmic soundscape created with Web Audio API.
Multi-Modal Authentication: Google OAuth, Facebook OAuth, and Email Magic Link with Firebase Authentication backend.
Advanced Animation and Interaction: GSAP and Framer Motion micro-interactions, magnetic buttons, celestial hover glows, and cosmic cursor trails.
Responsive and Adaptive Design: Full support for desktop, tablet, and mobile with adaptive shader and animation complexity.
Robust Admin Panel: Full feature management, user monitoring, logs, payments, and knowledge base control.
Payment & Subscription Integration: Razorpay-based payment gateway with multiple plans and premium feature gating.
user_flow_summary: Public Visitors land on Marketing Website pages with cosmic animations and smooth scroll experiences. They can explore features, read blogs, review pricing, and contact support.

New users sign up via Magic Link, Google, or Facebook OAuth. They proceed through a multi-step onboarding capturing personal astrology data including birth details, preferences, and uploads (palm, face, aura).
Authenticated users enter the App Shell featuring a cosmic dashboard summarizing daily horoscope, dasha, quick actions, and upcoming transits.
Users navigate to core astrology tools (Kundali, Numerology, Palmistry, Aura), interact with 3D charts, analyze reports, and receive AI Guru guidance through chat.
Users can generate reports, view detailed PDFs, and manage subscriptions and payments with Razorpay integration.
Users receive notifications about horoscope updates, reports, and payment statuses with interactive and accessible notification center.
Admins access a separate admin panel with functionality for user management, content control, monitoring, reports, and payment processing.
validation_criteria: UI visual and motion alignment strictly follows cosmic and spiritual design language with correct use of color palettes, typography, and animation easing curves as specified.
All core astrology and AI features fully functional with correct API interaction, accurate data display, and responsive interactivity across devices.
Authentication processes (Google, Facebook, Magic Link) must reliably grant access and handle errors gracefully.
3D graphics using R3F and Three.js should maintain 60fps on desktop and adaptive rendering on mobiles, with fallbacks to static or Lottie animations for low-performance devices.
Payment flows complete successfully through Razorpay with correct subscription state updated in user profiles.
Accessibility features meet WCAG 2.2 Level AA standards, including keyboard navigability, screen reader support, focus outlines, and reduced motion modes.
Soundscape and animation volume toggles function smoothly and respect system-level user preferences and app settings.
All page navigation transitions and micro-interactions must run seamlessly without jank or significant delays, consistent with the cosmic motion system.
Admin panel allows management of users, reports, payments, and logs with secure role-based access and operational performance.
Automated and manual QA tests confirm overall performance targets: stable FPS, resource usage limits, and cross-browser/device compatibility.
